mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.name as course_name, u.real_name FROM assignment a LEFT JOIN course c ON a.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.teacher_id = u.id WHERE a.course_id = #{courseId} AND a.status = 'active' ORDER BY a.deadline

SELECT a.*, c.name as course_name, u.real_name FROM assignment a LEFT JOIN course c ON a.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.teacher_id = u.id WHERE a.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND a.status = 'active' ORDER BY a.deadline

SELECT a.*, c.name as course_name, u.real_name FROM assignment a LEFT JOIN student_course sc ON a.course_id = sc.course_id LEFT JOIN course c ON a.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.teacher_id = u.id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId} AND a.status = 'active' ORDER BY a.deadline
